resources.string: About Us: We are a fake boba shop located in California. We started as a small grassroots booth and have now expanded into a full sized company with locations in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and San Jose. We strive to only use the most natural and high quality experience to bring you the best boba on the west coast.
Find us on GrubHub, Doordash, and Ritual!

Hours: 
 Mon - Fri: 8am - 7pm 
 Sat : 12am - 10pm 
 Sun: Closed
ALL SUMMER DRINKS ARE BOGO UNTIL 8/30 OR WHILE SUPPLIES LAST.
